pr_title: (CDAP-16008) Added Kerberos support to Remote Hadoop provisioner

timeline.message: (CDAP-16008) Added Kerberos support to Remote Hadoop provisioner
(CDAP-16008) Added Kerberos support to Remote Hadoop provisioner

timeline.bodyText: Curious what sets this property, is this coming from the cluster environment?
timeline.author: yaojiefeng

replies.bodyText: Yes. It is coming from the Hadoop configuration on the cluster.
